comments: Dan was a great teacher had him for research methods. you must go to class to do well because he gives tons of bonus points. His test are very difficult but he allows you to do test remedations and you can get half your points back made an A in his class. good class.
His tests are really hard, but if you go to class you can make a good grade. His teaching methods are a bit unusual but you get used to it.

Dan was a great teacher!!class attendance is not mandatory, but in order to succeed you must go, because there are always easy quizes that you can all work together on and bonus points almost every class. He gives you practice tests before the tests that are just like the test. Take this professor!

Dan was a great teacher. I was terrified of my required statistics and he made it easy to get an A. He tells you at the beginning what it takes to get an A and if you go to class and try at all it is not hard to succeed. He\'s a great teacher and a nice guy and is very understanding. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
